translation.title: What’s the Purpose of the Spiritual Life?

segments.en: Linked Discourses 35
15. The Old and the New
152. What’s the Purpose of the Spiritual Life?

segments.pli: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
segments.en: “Mendicants, if wanderers who follow another path were to ask you:
‘Reverends, what’s the purpose of living the spiritual life with the ascetic Gotama?’

segments.pli: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
segments.en: You should answer them:

segments.pli: ‘dukkhassa kho, āvuso, pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti.
segments.en: ‘The purpose of living the spiritual life under the Buddha is to completely understand suffering.’

segments.pli: Sace pana vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
segments.en: If wanderers who follow other paths were to ask you:

segments.pli: ‘katamaṃ panāvuso, dukkhaṃ, yassa pariññāya samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti?
segments.en: ‘Reverends, what is that suffering?’

segments.pli: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
segments.en: You should answer them:
‘The eye is suffering.
The purpose of living the spiritual life under the Buddha is to completely understand this.
Sights …
Eye consciousness …
Eye contact …

segments.pli: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ;
segments.en: The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact is also suffering.

segments.pli: tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati … pe …
segments.en: The purpose of living the spiritual life under the Buddha is to completely understand this.
The ear … nose … tongue … body …
mind …

segments.pli: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ;
segments.en: The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact is also suffering.
The purpose of living the spiritual life under the Buddha is to completely understand this.
This is that suffering.
The purpose of living the spiritual life under the Buddha is to completely understand this.’

segments.pli: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyāthā”ti.
segments.en: When questioned by wanderers who follow other paths, that’s how you should answer them.”
